thread.section_title: The Jewel facing Rockefeller Center - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect!
thread.title_full: Perfect! - Review of The Jewel facing Rockefeller Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Eva T
title: Perfect!
text: From the first call to book our room to our check out -- Their customer service and agents are so nice and well trained, very accommodating, and cover all necessities, including parking info and rates! The location is central and convenient to our shows/activities, and the rooms are new, clean and beautifully decorated/designed. The breakfast buffet was appeasing to the eye, large variety, and everything was so fresh and delicious! We love The Jewel and will definitely be back!
